title: [Large-scale] Philological Exploration of Medieval Galician Literature: Dialogue Between Popular and Academic Literature

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Spanish/Portuguese Proficiency, and Foundational Understanding of Medieval European Literature and Culture
context.additional_context: An introductory course for Hispanic Peninsula literature studies, enhancing comparative research capabilities by applying philological analysis methods

learning_goals: Learners can analyze linguistic features of medieval Galician literary texts using philological approaches
Learners can explain the interrelationship between popular literature and academic literature within a historical context
Learners can develop comparative research projects reflecting the socioeconomic backgrounds of early Galician literary works

resources: Timeline of medieval history in the Hispanic Peninsula
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
